description:
Colton is a 20-year-old college stud from a small town in Iowa. He seems like a totally sweet guy, with baby blue eyes and a shy smile.
He's into power lifting and boxing, which is what gives him that nice muscular physique. He said he loves the constant training aspect of boxing.
When I asked him about his girlfriend, he told me he doesn't really have one, but has several girls that he likes to keep up with. He also told me he's an ass man and loves to drop his load on the small of his girl's back — but only if she won't let him cum in her mouth!
title: Colton
